description: A convenience view providing simplified access to the items within the DICOM SR TID 1500 documents that contain qualitative measurements. All attributes named following the CamelCase notation correspond to standard DICOM attributes and are documented in the DICOM standard.

fields.description: Measurement group number corresponding to the measurement groups within the TID 1500 report, starting from 0.
fields.name: measurementGroup_number

fields.description: SOPInstanceUID of the segmentation object defining the region of interest corresponding to the measurement.
fields.name: segmentationInstanceUID

fields.description: SegmentNumber of the segment within the segmentation object referenced by segmentationInstanceUID defining the region of interest corresponding to the measurement.
fields.name: segmentationSegmentNumber

fields.description: SeriesInstanceUID corresponding to the image series over which the measurement was done.
fields.name: sourceSegmentedSeriesUID

fields.description: Value of the TID 1500 Measurement group row corresponding to the concept "Tracking Identifier" (e.g., row 2 in TID 1411)
fields.name: trackingIdentifier

fields.description: Value of the TID 1500 Measurement group row corresponding to the concept "Tracking Unique Identifier" (e.g., row 3 in TID 1411)
fields.name: trackingUniqueIdentifier

fields.description: Value of the concept code corresponding to TID 1500 Measurement group row where VT is CODE.
fields.name: Quantity

fields.description: Value corresponding to the concept listed in the Quantity field.
fields.name: Value

fields.description: Value of the TID 1500 Measurement group row corresponding to the concept "Finding" (e.g., row 3b in TID 1411)
fields.name: finding

fields.description: Value of the TID 1500 Measurement group row corresponding to the concept "Finding Site" (e.g., row 2 in TID 1419)
fields.name: findingSite
